abstract: In her review of “The Accidental Billionaires,” Ben Mezrich’s dramatized nonfiction book about the creation of Facebook, The New York Times’s Janet Maslin found it lacking in depth — in more ways than one.
snippet: In her review of “The Accidental Billionaires,” Ben Mezrich’s dramatized nonfiction book about the creation of Facebook, The New York Times’s Janet Maslin found it lacking in depth — in more ways than one.
lead_paragraph: The New York Times’s Janet Maslin reviewed “The Accidental Billionaires,” Ben Mezrich’s dramatized nonfiction book about the creation of Facebook and found it lacking in depth — in more ways than one:
